title: Woman pours liquid over homeless man as he's attacked by group in shocking video

Shocking footage shows a vicious attack where a defenceless man had liquid poured over him after he was beaten up in the street.

The 60-year-old victim, who is believed to be homeless , was targeted by a group of people in Brighton on Sunday evening.

According to a witness, the attackers followed him before launching the assault at around 8.30pm.

A man can be seen kicking him on the floor while he screams in agony.

After the attack, one person can be heard spitting and a woman was filmed pouring liquid on the man.

He cowers during the entire attack.

A witness said: "I was on my way to the cinema when it happened.

"It was awful, they were following him along the road shouting at him and then they all piled on him.

"People were screaming ‘stop, stop’ but they kept going.

"He wasn’t even fighting back.

"They kept shouting at him while he was on the floor.

“It’s terrible to see this happening on our city’s streets, I really hope the poor man is OK.”

A Sussex Police spokesman said officers were investigating the attack.

He added: “Video taken at the time was given to police by a passerby and enquiries are ongoing.”

Following the incident, a campaigner against homelessness has warned about violence on the street.

Jim Deans, who runs the Sussex Homeless Support buses in Brighton, said: "Worryingly, people who tuck themselves out the way and are not intruding on the public, are an easier target.

"Most of the guys are so exhausted physically and mentally as they’ve not slept for days.



"Violence is rife in the city, it’s absolutely every day and it’s not just men, it’s women too.



"The most common violence you see is from the public, whether verbally or physically.

"If you don’t agree with someone begging or sleeping rough, then just walk past.

"If you can’t help them up, don’t help them down.”

Anyone who knows who the people in the video may be should contact the police by calling 101.
description: The 60-year-old victim cowers and shouting can be heard shouting as he's attacked in the street in Brighton
